name: Halloween World (itch)
description:
Do you want Halloween to never end?
Then this game is for you!

Say goodbye to the usual boring life and go in search of adventure and unexpected acquaintances to a world where there is always a spooky holiday!

But remember, even at the party, don't stray too far from the crowd. Who knows what might be waiting for you in a quiet and cozy corner...

"Halloween World" is a 3D horror adventure game for the whole family (especially if you are from a weird family) with a strong focus on exploring and a small but very cozy world.

Simple riddles, bizarre characters and strange humor will help pass the autumn evening and create a holiday mood.

And a short length will not steal you from your family and friends for a long time😉

We made this game in two weeks for jam

The first room in game uses props from QuixelMegascans
